summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.3°C) and outside temperature (down 1.7°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 731 m) and light levels (up 9969 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 12023 lux), cloud levels (up 1430 m), feels like temperature (up 4.3°C), and outside temperature (up 3.3°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 730.7m lower than yesterday, 538.1m lower than the past week, 1430.1m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 745m minimum and 3580m maximum, with an average of 1255.7m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1793.8m and 2690m.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Chance of light rain, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and bright intervals likely. Weather could become unsettled.
